Kemenangan Persib Atas Kalteng Dibayar Mahal
03 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Anggi Tiar


Kemenangan Persib Atas Kalteng Dibayar Mahal

KBRN, Bandung : Persib Bandung sukes membawa pulang 3 poin dari Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Palangkaraya. Hasil itu didapat usai, Persib menaklukan tuan rumah Kalteng Putra 2-0 pada laga lanjutan Liga 1 Indonesia 2019, Jumat (1/11/2019) kemarin. Akan tetapi kemenangan berkat dua gol Kevin van Kippersluis (45'+4) dan Ezechiel N'Douassel (61') itu, nampaknya harus dibayar mahal. Ya, kemenangan itu dibayar dengan cederanya dua pemain yakni, Ardi Idrus dan Ezechiel N'Douassel. Menurut, dokter tim Rafi Ghani, kedua pemain itu bakal menjalani masa recovery selama dua hari sebelum kembali dipantau kebugaraanya pada Senin (4/11/2019) menjelang laga kandang menhadapi PSIS Semarang, Rabu (6/11/2019) mendatang. "Ada dua pemain yang digantikan karena cedera, Ezechiel dan Ardi Idrus. Tetapi kami masih harus melakukan observasi dalam satu atau dua hari ini. Mudah-mudahan cederanya tidak serius," kata Rafi seperti dikutip situs resmi Liga Indonesia, Minggu (3/11/2019)."Nanti kan masih ada beberapa hari untuk persiapan sebelum menghadapi PSIS, tanggal 6, namun kami berharap bukan cedera serius," tambahnya. Meski demikian, Rafi menjelaskan bahwa cedera yang dialami Ardi bukan tergolong cedera serius. Hanya mendapati pembengkakan pada mata kakinya. Sedangkan, cedera Ezechiel adalah nyeri yang ia keluhkan pasca memperkuat Timnas Chad."Ada bengkak di bagian mata kakinya. Tetapi sudah kami tangani, Alhamdulillah tidak ada masalah dan dia sudah bisa berjalan lagi. Hanya memang masih ada sedikit bengkak. Tetapi kelihatannya bukan cedera yang serius," papar Rafi. "Sedangan Ezechiel, ketika pulang dari Chad waktu itu dia memang ada keluhan dibagian abduktor (cedera paha). Sebenarnya kemarin sudah membaik, namun karena mungkin kemarin intensitas permainan juga tinggi, jadi dia mengalami keluhan itu lagi," tuntasnya menjelaskan.

Persib Victory Over Central Kalimantan Paid Expensive
03 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Anggi Tiar


Persib Victory Over Central Kalimantan Paid Expensive

KBRN, Bandung: Persib Bandung succeeds in bringing home 3 points from Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Palangkaraya. The results were obtained after, Persib conquered the host Kalteng Putra 2-0 in the 2019 Indonesia League 1 continued match, Friday (11/01/2019) yesterday. But the victory thanks to two goals from Kevin van Kippersluis (45 '+ 4) and Ezechiel N'Douassel (61'), seems to be paid handsomely. Yes, the victory was paid for by the injuries of two players namely, Ardi Idrus and Ezechiel N'Douassel. According to team doctor Rafi Ghani, the two players will undergo a recovery period of two days before being monitored again by their disaster on Monday (11/04/2019) ahead of the home match against PSIS Semarang, Wednesday (11/06/2019) future. "There are two players who were replaced because of injuries, Ezechiel and Ardi Idrus. But we still have to make observations in one or two days. Hopefully the injury is not serious," Rafi was quoted as saying on the official Indonesian League website, Sunday (3/11 / 2019) "Later there will still be a few days to prepare before facing PSIS, on the 6th, but we hope it is not a serious injury," he added. However, Rafi explained that Ardi's injury was not classified as a serious injury. Only found swelling in his ankles. Meanwhile, Ezechiel's injury is a pain that he complained of after strengthening the Chad national team. "There is swelling in the ankle. But we have dealt, Alhamdulillah there is no problem and he was able to walk again. Only indeed there was still a little swelling. seriously, "said Rafi. "As for Ezechiel, when he returned from Chad at that time he did have a complaint in the abductor (thigh injury) section. Actually yesterday it had improved, but maybe yesterday the intensity of the game was also high, so he experienced the complaint again," he explained.
